start.heading: The Regime
start.subheading: An analysis of justice, morality, and Meta-Preemptive Ethics in a creative democracy
start.author: By Mike Luo, November 2024
start.quote: "The ignorant man is not free, because what confronts him is an alien world... " - Hegel
start.text:
This rabbit hole stretches for about 25 minutes.
Trigger warning: sometimes intense political themes.

end.heading: Thank you for playing.
end.subheading: "The essence of democracy is not voting but speaking; not majority rule, but reasoned argument." - Fareed Zakaria
end.quote: Special thanks to: the staff and students of AFTRS.
end.credits: Special thanks to: the staff and students of AFTRS.
